page.title: 12GARDEN CENTRE NEAR PEBMARSH
page.content: The Garden Centre near Pebmarsh is called{Countess Cross Nurseries.}It has 4 acres of land.Part of it is a garden centre and part of it is a nursery.There are greenhouses and polytunnels and plants are grown for sale in the garden centre.Also on sale are fruit trees,flowering trees,shrubs,perennials,conifers and bedding plants in the good weather.Pots,peat and other gardening things are also sold. There are two tractors for planting the fields with vegetables and there is a van for delivering things. In the winter houseplants are sent to market in London. The Nurseries are owned by{Mr.and {Mrs.P.McGillivray. }
